entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kirkland Lake

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
